import React, { useState } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import ShopCategory from '../../Pages/ShopCategory' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useState(ShopContext); return (

Produts

Title

Price

Quantity

Totatal

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0){

{e.name}

${e.price}

{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} alt="" />
} })}
) } export default CartItems
